schema_name.title: Schema Name
schema_name.description: The schema associated with this instance

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: Display name of this IDOML (Apache Airflow) configuration

metadata.description: Additional data specific to this metadata

runtime_type.title: Runtime Type
runtime_type.description: The runtime associated with this instance

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of this IDOML (Apache Airflow) configuration

scheduler_type.title: Schduler server type
scheduler_type.description: The type of scheduler which is deployed, currently only Apache Airflow is supported

api_endpoint.title: IDOML Scheduler UI Endpoint
api_endpoint.description: The IDOML Scheduler server UI endpoint, e.g. http://localhost:8080

git_type.title: Git hosting server type
git_type.description: Git provider, the server type where the git repository is stored

github_api_endpoint.title: Git hosting server API Endpoint
github_api_endpoint.description: The server URL / API endpoint - Public or Enterprise

github_repo.title: Git hosting server Repository
github_repo.description: The repository where DAGs are stored, which is syncronized with the IDOML Scheduler server

github_branch.title: Git hosting server Repository Branch
github_branch.description: Existing branch in the repository where DAGs are stored

github_repo_token.title: Personal Access Token
github_repo_token.description: Token that has permission to push to the DAG repository

public_cos_endpoint.title: Public Cloud Object Storage Endpoint
public_cos_endpoint.description: The public Cloud Object Storage endpoint

cos_bucket.title: Cloud Object Storage Bucket Name
cos_bucket.description: The Cloud Object Storage bucket name

cos_auth_type.title: Cloud Object Storage Authentication Type
cos_auth_type.description: Authentication type Elyra uses to authenticate with Cloud Object Storage

cos_secret.title: Cloud Object Storage Credentials Secret
cos_secret.description: Kubernetes secret that's defined in the specified user namespace, containing the Cloud Object Storage username and password. This property is required for authentication type KUBERNETES_SECRET.

cos_username.title: Cloud Object Storage Username
cos_username.description: The Cloud Object Storage username. This property is required for authentication type USER_CREDENTIALS and KUBERNETES_SECRET.

cos_password.title: Cloud Object Storage Password
cos_password.description: The Cloud Object Storage password. This property is required for authentication type USER_CREDENTIALS and KUBERNETES_SECRET.
